title: Louise Tobin with Emil Coleman's Orchestra

sources.title: Louise Tobin with Emil Coleman's Orchestra
sources.description: Two short films featuring Louise Tobin with Emil Coleman and His Orchestra . The songs and film titles are identical. The source file was inexplicably flipped horizontally, so I corrected that and also slightly adjusted the sync between the video and audio. It still isn't entirely perfect, but this was a low budget short film and I don't think much effort was made post production to perfectly align Tobin's lip syncing with the pre-recorded soundtrack, but I did my best with what I have (I'm not a professional). Hope you all enjoy it. November 12, 1945 Just One of Those Things November 26, 1945 June Comes Around Every Year Reference : The Soundies Distributing Corporation of America : a history and filmography of their "jukebox" musical films of the 1940s  (pp. 150, 152) **FAIR USE NOTICE** This content may contain Copyrighted (©) Material.
